website_summaries.verdict: Though more expensive that others on our list considering the amount you get, it's a quality oil and worth considering if you plan to use it for lashes, brows, and other small areas.
pros: Cold-pressed, pure, and USDA organic castor oil that comes with applicators
Dropper, brush, and spoolie make it perfect for applying to targeted areas such as spots of thinning hair, lashes, and brows
cons: You only get an ounce of castor oil, making it the priciest option on our list
No indication of whether or not it's hexane-free

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for my short brittle eyelashes for the past 3-weeks and I can see a little growth and thickness in my lashes! I apply it at night after, I take a shower then wipe it off in the morning. It's a great product...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Eyelash’s look like spiders !!
customer_reviews.text: This castor up is amazingggggggggggyy I used it to grow out my eyebrows and eyelashes and they have never looked better !! I wasn’t using a big brand eyelash serum for years and it gave me even better results than the $85 eyelash serum I was using !! It’s pure quality compared to a few others I tried I like this one the best. Great quality and great price one bottle usually lasts me about 3 months of everyday use. Plus it’s natural . Plus plus plus. My friend told me about this brand and now I’ll never go back. Very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: No improvement to brows and lashes after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: After following directions and using faithfully on eyebrow and eyelash for 1 month, I saw no improvement. 2.5 years ago I lost my hair to chemotherapy and then entered menopause. I was hoping this product would make my brows and lashes full again, but it did not work for me. I contacted the company and they validated that I was using the product correctly, but only reiterated that their products works.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary S.

customer_reviews.title: High quality and good price
customer_reviews.text: As a woman in her late 40's, I've been dismayed to learn it's common for eyebrows and lashes to lighten. I have good eyebrows and I miss how dark they used to be! I purchased this fortifying eyebrow and lash conditioner just a week ago, so I'll update my review at a later date. It's hard to believe that it's already working after only one week, but I think it might already be starting to restore the thickness and color of my eyebrows. Too soon to tell on the lashes. It's super easy to put on and I like how thick it is compared to other brands I've tried (which definitely did not work).
customer_reviews.author: SD Silver

customer_reviews.title: Nice product overall
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this long enough to notice results yet, but it feels nice applied to my brows and lashes. A little goes a long way. It seems a good price for an organic sustainable product. It’s cool that it comes with application brushes. My only complaint is that there isn’t an easy clean way to set the dropper lid aside to use the application brushes. And I’m not sure the best way to store the brushes after use. I just keep it all in the box it came in but it’s kind of messy.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: YUK!
customer_reviews.text: Before bedtime I applied a thin line of oil along my lash line (like eyeliner) and then brushed it onto my lashes and brows. The texture is thick and viscous. The next morning the I had to remove it with soap and water. I never use soap on my eyelids but it's the only way I could get the sticky mess off. It may very well live up to its claim but I'll never use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great for eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it daily for about a week and my eyebrows are so moisturized. I used to have very dry skin under my eyebrows and that has completely cleared up. Will continue to use just for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this! My lashes didn’t really exist. No mascara helped me. I looked to lash extensions and the price was ridiculous! I took to amazon to look for something to help me grow my lashes. I found something that was $30. I almost bought it until an ad on Facebook came up for this thank god it did! This has so many more positive reviews than the other one && i see why! In 2 weeks I started to see results. Now almost 2 months later && I’m almost to my lashes goal. So worth the money. You will not regret getting this!
customer_reviews.author: Rochell

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Really like the tools that come with ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Really like the tools that come with it. I use the oil in my homemade eye makeup remover, and then apply it straight once a week. My lashes feel thicker and stronger. Nothing drastic, but I think it’s helped reduce shedding.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Will buy this again!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is very good. Does not feel super oily and heavy like other oils. I really saw the change in my lashes, they grow longer, stronger and I have more lashes than ever. You have to use every night and make sure you put it in the root. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent growth & moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I started using this 1.5 weeks ago. My eyebrows are thin at points from so much tweezing back in the late 1990s/ early 2000s. I apply it once at night before bed. So far, I see new lash growth in the sparse areas. And the hair coming in is soft & smooth. I haven't noticed much growth on my lashes (length or thickness), but I do notice my lashes are smooth & soft. Great product! Does what it says! I'll definitely use all of this bottle then buy more, as it's a great price!
customer_reviews.author: little black rain cloud

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered very quickly and was exactly as described. The included eyelash brush is very helpful in application. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slight difference
customer_reviews.text: I use it every night since I've received it. I don't see that much improvement yet but it's still early. I have developed a tiny sty on my upper lash line in my right eye but that's quite common for me, I think it's just introducing a new agent into that area, nothing to do with the product itself, especially since I don't wear mascara or any kind of makeup. My eyes may be playing tricks on me but I do feel like I see a slight difference in my eyebrows and eyelashes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharina Black

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I like it I guess. I haven't noticed any growth though. I actually use it more in my cuticles lol. I took one star because it makes my mascara slide right off
customer_reviews.author: Kaneisha Dabbs

customer_reviews.title: This product didn't work on my eyelashes. I tried ...
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work on my eyelashes. I tried using a little bit & I didn't see any results. So i increased the amount that I put on my lashes, then that didn't work, it put a film over my eyeballs & made my eye site blurry. Tried this product for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work on my eye lashes not brows lol but it does bother my eyes the tiniest bit. But I have very sensitive eyes so I do like using the product!
customer_reviews.author: QueenBee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for lashes
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this is there is NO smell and although its thick...its not sticky. I have not had it long enough to tell if it helps growth, but there is a noticeable difference in the feel of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product over a year (close to 2). This is the only product that helped my hair grow and thicken. I have used prenatal vitamins, it works vitamins and everything imaginable. Worth the money and lasts a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: Soothing...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it long enough to see results but I really like the soothing effect. I have dry eyes.
customer_reviews.author: PedoGirl

customer_reviews.title: On the fence as yo whether there are any benefits
customer_reviews.text: Not it sure this is really doing what it states. I’ve seen no improvement in brows or lashes
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: It actually works....
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked this actually worked and I've only used a few times. My eyelashes are beautiful, and super long.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Sorry... it didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: followed directions but not a keeper.... it didn't make any improvements on my brows and lashes
customer_reviews.author: Sani

customer_reviews.title: It didn't help to grow my eyebrow.
customer_reviews.text: I use this castor oil for my eyebrow. It didn't help. I don't see any growing hair or darker hair in the past few weeks. It was kinda thick oil.
customer_reviews.author: ALandofSmiles

customer_reviews.title: I am not so sure about this one
customer_reviews.text: The oil is thick but I didn't like it on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It says for eyelashes, but really it's just castor oil so you can use it for whatever. I put it on my eyebrows to try to grow them thicker too. Super moisturizing for your face.
customer_reviews.author: James Ferrauola

customer_reviews.title: Makes my eyelashes fall out
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this. I've been using for over 2 weeks now and I'm actually losing eyelashes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of oil. Not enough oil for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gladineharvey

customer_reviews.title: Growth
customer_reviews.text: My eyelashes and eyebrows have grown sufficiently with this products
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Zamudio

customer_reviews.title: Castor Oil
customer_reviews.text: The oil is thick and clogs up my eyes and makes them sticky. Also eyes hurt after using the oil. Possible allergy.
customer_reviews.author: zumbagirl

customer_reviews.title: I think it's helped regrowing my hair
customer_reviews.text: I like it eventhough I'm not sure if the result is because of this oil or another kind of treatment that I've started few weeks after this one
customer_reviews.author: ShiJay

customer_reviews.title: Stuff works
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this on my eyebrows too and it works. Give it three weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product comes with eye dropper
customer_reviews.text: Love that product came with eye dropper but still is messy when putting oil in eyes
customer_reviews.author: NewMe

customer_reviews.title: Thicker brows
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really does work..I put on my brows and they’re thicker
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: WORKS PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: This has worked perfect for my eyelashes. I have only been using the product for one week, but the results have been immediate. The package only contained one applicator, so I did purchase extra applicators.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fessel

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: I started putting this on my eyelashes and eyebrows before bed and noticed a difference within a week,
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Keeping hope alive
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of hype about this product. I'm yet to see exactly what it does. So far, it hasn't worked for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Margarette Davis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: My eyelashes are growing longer. As for my eyebrows, I haven’t seen much grow in them. I don’t know if it takes longer for the eyebrows to grow or not.
customer_reviews.author: Azsa

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I only used the product for a few days, no real change yet, but very moisturizing...seems promising.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: I haven't tried it yet, please follow up with me.
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried the product, however, it was delivered promptly and appears to be as described.
customer_reviews.author: Anne D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: You definitely get what you pay for and it is fairly easy to use. I've only used it for a couple of days so I cannot say that I have saw results yet.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I actually works with hair growth and the shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!  Glad to have found it!
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate an organic remedy to sparse eyelashes and brows! Isn't it lovely that something so basic can be the answer
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: My eyelashes and eyebrows have grown since using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper #42

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It came in an easy to use dispenser, with a great lash brush.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Bradford Rose

customer_reviews.title: Results
customer_reviews.text: Results are fast, with in days my eye lashes grew a good amount.
customer_reviews.author: Nestor Vargas

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my eyelashes and i can already see the results!
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product works fast. I could see a difference within 3 days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked good for me I liked it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This organic castor oil is great for eyelas growth and hair growth. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SMM9708

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the texture and the quality of this oil. Can't wait to see how my lashes grow! Results are in!
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Goes on thick, doesn't run, comes with applicators
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, I've read all about the benefits of caster oil for eyebrows and lashes. This was recommended to me by users on a beauty blog I follow, they had great results. Came with spooley brush and eyeliner brush for easy application. Im sure ţo clean the brushes after use and don't double dip. It goes on thick, stays in place, doesn't run, I was worried about that around my eyes as I wear contacts.
customer_reviews.author: e-shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My lashes and brows are responding well to the castor oil. Thicker and longer.
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna Shadlow

customer_reviews.title: My eyelashes grew!
customer_reviews.text: I had lash extensions for eight months and finally had them removed. My eyelashes got short!! I was not happy but at least they didn't fall off. I was told to use castor oil on them and voila! it worked! My lashes are back to normal and I think a wee bit longer!
customer_reviews.author: Lizette A Najera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I finally got it and so far I really like it. It's has cure my birdnest hair. It's great. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: ships fast, its very thick,
customer_reviews.text: ships fast,its very thick,ive only been using it for 3 days so i cant say if it works or not
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Grew in eyebrows quickly
customer_reviews.text: This product really works..my eyebrows grew in thick and healthy in just a couple of months..now I use it for maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Mcpherson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel that this works as well as claimed!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn E. Nieber

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have not noticed any type of growth in my brows. I’ve been applying it religiously since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: nolla_.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this for my cataracts. My vision is better and my dry eye is gone. Castor oil has nutrients for the eyes also. Cheaper than pharma drugs

customer_reviews.title: did nothing to my lashes
customer_reviews.text: Heard about this remedy for years....but I can not personally endorse

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help my eyelashes from falling out. I have noticed that they are getting fuller.

customer_reviews.title: Lashes don’t grow using castor oil
customer_reviews.text: This is not a legitimate way to grow your eyelashes. I’ve been using this at night regularly and nothing has changed.

customer_reviews.title: If you are thinking about buying, do it!
customer_reviews.text: So far is working great! I will definitely keep using.

customer_reviews.title: great serum

product_meta.title: Castor Oil For Eyelashes - 100% USDA Certified Pure Cold Pressed - Boost Eyebrow Growth Serum, Longer Eyelash Serum & Eyebrows, Face and Skin with - includes Treatment Applicator Kit 1oz (30ml)
feature_bullets: ✅ USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC QUALITY: Virgin Castor Oil Organic cold-pressed, USDA Certified Organic and hexane-free. iQ Natural Castor Oil for hair growth contains all the natural botanicals that release from the castor seed during the gentle extraction process.

✅ CASTOR OIL FOR EYELASHES WORKS: A natural wonder that works to nourish, strengthen, and beautify both hair, skin, and nails, and body. Not only is it an excellent moisturizer, it also restores hair shine and healthy skin glow while repairing split ends.

✅ GROW LUSH LONG EYELASHES & THICK BROWS Castor oil is naturally filled with nutrients that not only boost hair production, but leaves hair shiny, thicker, and stronger. Organic Castor Oil works as a eyebrow growth serum by strengthening and hydrating the eyelashes.

✅ SMOOTHER SKIN - Natural Castor Oil is naturally loaded with vitamin E, minerals and proteins and contains powerful antibacterial and anti-fungal properties. Rich in omega 9 fatty acids, essential for proper hair and follicle nourishment to stimulate hair growth and re-growth.

✅ 100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE: Don’t worry about money, we are so convinced in our products that if they don't live up to your expectations you can send it back for a full, complete refund so you have nothing to lose!
